summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.5°C) and outside temperature (down 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 760 m) and light levels (up 10460 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12497 lux), cloud levels (up 1458 m), feels like temperature (up 4.5°C), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 759.8m lower than yesterday, 565.3m lower than the past week, 1458.2m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1226.6m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1791.9m and 2680m.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Possible light showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
